hint1: They can fly, and will crush you!
hint2: Three fast, moderate-damage single-target ranged air troops.
hint3: A bit vulnerable to splash damage, but it'll do the trick.

hint1: They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.
hint2: Two low-damage yet medium-ranged single-target troops with knowledge in hair coloring.
hint3: They are inexpensive support troops or a quick defense against small pushes.

hint1: The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin.
hint2: A moderate-damage single-target melee troop.
hint3: This jack-of-most-trades card can act as a great mini-tank.

hint1: Who the heck taught these guys to throw spears?!
hint2: Three very fast, low-damage single-target ranged troops.
hint3: They are excellent against small single-target ground pushes.

hint1: Small, fast, green and mean!
hint2: Four very fast, moderate damage, single-target melee troops.
hint3: Just watch out for any gold that you might have.

hint1: Small, lightly protected skeleton who throws bombs.
hint2: While fragile and only targeting ground, he is decent against medium to large swarms.
hint3: He is a very fragile unit that provides a great ranged splash attack.

hint1: Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!
hint2: Three fast, low-damage single-target melee troops.
hint3: They can distract enemies when timed right or just exist to cycle your deck.

hint1: A horde of melee attackers with mean mustaches and even meaner tempers.
hint2: Despite only targeting ground, they are a mighty collective force.
hint3: They are a mighty collective force and can swiftly deal with a great variety of threats.

hint1: Locked in an eternal battle with Knight for the best mustache.
hint2: His attack will chain onto up to nine units within four tiles of each other.
hint3: Shows his killer mustache to the table.

hint1: They also play a mean rib cage xylophone duet.
hint2: Skeletal cousins of the Baby Dragon move.
hint3: However, their bones seem to be a bit brittle, as they have much less health.

hint1: It'd be adorable if it wasn't on fire.
hint2: One very fast, near-melee splash troop that packs a flaming hot punch.
hint3: Good incinerating tool against tightly-packed swarms and glass cannons.

hint1: Think of them as sweet, purple... balls of DESTRUCTION!
hint2: Five single-target melee units that offer good defensive and offensive value.
hint3: Their strong bites can easily deal with solo mini-tanks.

hint1: They dream of ponies and one day wearing metal buckets.
hint2: Six fairly tough melee ground troops spread out in a horizontal formation across the arena.
hint3: With the addition of a shield to absorb otherwise devastating strikes, they can distract and repel most enemies.

hint1: Destroying enemy buildings with his massive cannon is his job; making a raggedy blond beard look good is his passion.
hint2: An infamous, hulking beast of a man.
hint3: His powerful cannonballs plough through any building he decides to shoot.

hint1: Stay frosty.
hint2: He's got enough health to survive one attack from most units while he deploys, allowing him to get the jump on them.
hint3: Has excellent defensive and offensive capabilities due to his freeze.

hint1: It's surprising how often she needs her axes sharpened.
hint2: She won't hesitate to tear you apart.
hint3: She attacks very fast and is resistant to spells.

hint1: It's a Skeleton party in the sky.
hint2: Packed with bones that drifts through the air looking for towers.
hint3: It's a bit on the fragile side, but it soars quickly through the arena.

hint1: It's like a Goblin Value Pack!
hint2: Together, they can clear a multitude of units.
hint3: Three have knives for powerful ground melee combat deployed in front, and three have spears for ranged attacks.

hint1: Spawns a pair of leveled up Barbarians.
hint2: Brain? How about some brawn instead!
hint3: Together, they can wreck tanks, evaporate glass cannons.

hint1: Three's a crowd, six is a horde!
hint2: But keep caution using them, otherwise you may lose everything...
hint3: This card has ridiculously high damage per second.

hint1: This is what happens when Archers get bored!
hint2: This former Archer has turned rebellious.
hint3: She'll push herself back with every attack, making it harder for enemy troops to reach her.

hint1: Slingshots full of Double Trouble Gum!
hint2: A value pack of a trio of trouble, with one boy and two girls.
hint3: With big health and big damage combined, this card is a complete wombo combo of a push by themselves.

hint1: A medium-sized shaft, red fletchings.
hint2: Its moderate damage and large radius makes clearing swarms.
hint3: Lackluster against higher health units like the Knight.

hint1: Briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius.
hint2: Forces enemies to re-target, resets attacks or brings that slight extra damage to finish things off.
hint3: What's not to like in this bottle of voltage?

hint1: Once it began rolling down Frozen Peak, there was no stopping it.
hint2: It will make them slow down for 3 seconds and chill out.
hint3: Squishier troops tend to go splat while all but the heaviest of troops get knocked back.

hint1: No need to sign for this package!
hint2: You know what they say, 3 seconds or it's free!
hint3: It will be delivered with a 2 second delay, dropping from the sky.

hint1: Shoots cannonballs with deadly effect.
hint2: One of the shortest lifetimes out of all the buildings.
hint3: For 3 Elixir, you get a building which has moderate hitpoints and damage.

hint1: Shoots big boulders that deal area damage.
hint2: It's quite hard to stop these explosive shells from hitting a tower.
hint3: Any enemy troop that gets too close will be ignored.

hint1: The power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.
hint2: Hides underground, preventing any and all damage sources.
hint3: It can zap enemies, although it won't stun like most electric-based cards do.

hint1: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone.
hint2: The classic glass cannon — a mighty punch packed within a moderate health.
hint3: Deliver him some pancakes, and you'll see his sweet and cute side!

hint1: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair.
hint2: A consistent 4 Elixir single-target shot attacking both air and ground.
hint3: She is a reliable support or defense unit with a trusty boomstick.

hint1: A real one-man wrecking crew!
hint2: He ignores all enemy troops and slowly makes his way towards buildings.
hint3: The "original" tank.

hint1: She can take them all out with a few spins.
hint2: You can't run, don't even hide!
hint3: This tough mini-tank swings her axe 360º to take out swarms.

hint1: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.
hint2: He is spell resistant, so not even a lone Fireball can take him out!
hint3: A flying armored gargoyle with below-average health and high damage.

hint1: Two troops holding a big log charge at the nearest building.
hint2: A fast but fragile 4 Elixir surprise to smash into buildings.
hint3: Once it gets charging, it must be taken out before it rams into a tower.

hint1: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena.
hint2: Excels against groups of enemies, but not so much against tanks.
hint3: Burns foes on the ground and in the air with heavy-hitting fireballs.

hint1: The Master Builder has sent his first contraption to the Arena!
hint2: A 4 Elixir flying card with moderately-low hitpoints.
hint3: Its long range and moderate damage allow it to attack from afar, often out-ranging its target.

hint1: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river.
hint2: Zoom past troops with his moderate-high health and blazing fast speed.
hint3: Also, his hog will jump over the river!

hint1: The King’s personal pets are loose! They love to chomp on apples and towers alike.
hint2: Their speed and numbers make them difficult to stop.
hint3: For 5 Elixir, four moderate health, low damage troops that rush the enemy tower.

hint1: Disrespecting them would not be just a mistake, it would be a cardinal sin!
hint2: They can stop almost anything with their powerful muskets.
hint3: Three independent, very powerful markswomen with high burst damage.

hint1: With each attack, she unleashes a powerful healing aura that restores Hitpoints to herself and friendly Troops.
hint2: Even though she has wings, she cannot attack air units.
hint3: Whenever she is deployed or hits something, she heals herself and all troops around herself.

hint1: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies.
hint2: A cheap yet versatile mini-tank.
hint3: Deals slowing death damage that can destroy low-health enemy units.

hint1: Runs fast, shoots far and chews gum.
hint2: A 3 Elixir card with a fast fire rate, long range, and high speed.
hint3: He resembles a Goblin, but wears a voodoo mask with red eyes.

hint1: It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.
hint2: This 4 Elixir metallic oven has magically grown feet and arms.
hint3: But the oven is not for show, as he will spawn waves of a Fire Spirit at the front every 5 seconds.

hint1: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines.
hint2: If it moves, then it won’t for much longer.
hint3: This 4 Elixir trio of menaces will stun a target until it is destroyed.

hint1: Boom goes dynamite!
hint2: For 4 Elixir, this Goblin is packed with explosions and dynamite.
hint3: Once he falls to his demise, he goes out with a BANG.

hint1: A mischievous Spirit that leaps at enemies.
hint2: This little guy runs, jumps, and splashes just like his Spirit siblings.
hint3: It is lemon in color and is shaped more closely to a rectangle.

hint1: This invisible bush skulks towards the nearest building.
hint2: It's still a deceptive tacti- I mean, a completely ordinary bush!!
hint3: For 2 Elixir, this totally normal bush crawls towards the nearest building.

hint1: Splits into two when destroyed.
hint2: Provides formidable tanking and damaging ability for the very low price of 3 Elixir.
hint3: A hefty mound of Elixir.

hint1: Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage.
hint2: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a… meteor?
hint3: It can even knock back some ground troops!

hint1: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it.
hint2: The ridiculously high damage comes with a ridiculously small area of effect and a long delay.
hint3: It is large with a nose cone, an iron hull, fins, and a skull printed on.

hint1: Deals Damage per second to Troops and Crown Towers.
hint2: It is a murky brown liquid encased in a small oblong vial.
hint3: Rocking the ground for 3 Elixir.

hint1: Brawler always skips leg day.
hint2: That cage won't hold for long though.
hint3: Larger and bulkier, has a unibrow.

hint1: Don't look inside... you don't want to see how they're made.
hint2: For 4 Elixir, the building will take a nap when there is no action.
hint3: A wooden hut with a thatched roof.

hint1: Building that periodically spawns Skeletons to fight the enemy.
hint2: A cheap spawner with moderate hitpoints at the cost of only 3 Elixir.
hint3: When destroyed, 4 more spooky scary Skeletons pop up.

hint1: Deals area damage to anything dumb enough to stand near it.
hint2: This building is one of the most effective against ground units in the game.
hint3: The building is made of wood, surrounded by steel rams, tied with ropes on the sides.

hint1: Burns through even the biggest and toughest enemies!
hint2: For 5 Elixir, this incinerator will roast even massive tanks.
hint3: A tall, narrow building made of iron, straddling on top of a lava pool, with a glowing orange lens on top.

hint1: Building that periodically spawns Troops to fight the enemy.
hint2: This crude but high-hitpoint barrack spawns a trio of Troops every 15 seconds.
hint3: A wooden hut with a team-colored roof and a sword hoisted above the entrance.

hint1: You gotta spend Elixir to make Elixir!
hint2: For 6 Elixir, this passive building has moderate health along with the ability to produce bonus Elixir.
hint3: A wooden building reinforced with team-colored seals on top and bases on the bottom, with a vertical glass vat in between two wooden slabs.

hint1: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields.
hint2: Surround enemies with this armored pile of bones.
hint3: They appear to be Skeletons, but are somewhat taller, wear black helmets with team-colored feathers.

hint1: Burps fireballs from the sky that deal area damage.
hint2: A 4 Elixir troop with moderately high hitpoints and fast movement speed that deals low splash damage.
hint3: A small, spring green dragon with short, stubby, team-colored wings, ears, spikes, tongue, hands and feet, brown eyes, and yellow sclerae.

hint1: Meet Larry and his friends Harry, Terry, Gerry, Mary, etc.
hint2: This massive swarm can overwhelm single-target enemy units in the blink of an eye!
hint3: Spawns 15 Skeletons in a scatter formation.

hint1: Summons Skeletons, shoots destructo beams, has glowing pink eyes that unfortunately don't shoot lasers.
hint2: While her health is only decent and splash damage is mediocre for 5 Elixir.
hint3: A woman with glowing pink eyes, no legs, wears a violet cloak.

hint1: Swings from the hip, but packs a huge punch.
hint2: A very tender robot from the inside, unless you decide to be mean to her or her butterflies!
hint3: She wears heavy dark steel blue armor.

hint1: It sounds like he has a bucket on his head.
hint2: For 4 Elixir, the lesser known Prince has moderately high hitpoints.
hint3: A man who has blue eyes, black eyebrows, and is mostly covered in dark steel armor.

hint1: Don't let the little pony fool you.
hint2: Very high damage and good hitpoints for 5 Elixir.
hint3: A man in heavy, golden armor, who wields a striped team-colored lance.

hint1: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE.
hint2: Watch out, an air raid is coming!
hint3: Held together by patches and ropes, and is piloted by a Wall Breaker.

hint1: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb.
hint2: This oversized skeleton costs 6 Elixir and gets distracted by everything.
hint3: A colossal Skeleton that wears a team-colored ushanka, has an underbite.

hint1: Need your weapons sharpened? You've come to the right place.
hint2: Don't mess with this bulky and big woman!
hint3: A large humanoid creature with long orange hair which covers her eyes and a large red nose.

hint1: This jolly green Goblin Giant stomps towards enemy buildings.
hint2: Not all Goblins are weak!
hint3: A colossal, aquamarine-skinned Goblin wearing a brown aviator hat.

hint1: What he lacks in accuracy, he makes up for with his impressively bushy eyebrows.
hint2: For 4 Elixir, this mustachioed man with a double-barreled gun has moderate health and can shoot a wave of bullets.
hint3: A man wearing a brown cloth, gloves, belt, pants and boots, a team-colored shirt and coonskin cap.

hint1: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings.
hint2: A massive beast of a rock.
hint3: A menacing rock brute with team-colored eyes and crystals on its back.

hint1: Suffers from middle child syndrome to boot.
hint2: This dragon attacks slowly and does low damage per hit for 5 Elixir.
hint3: A small blue dragon with blue eyes, gray spots on its back.

hint1: A daring duo of dangerous dive bombers.
hint2: Those guys have broke the Arena's walls and inserted their way into the King's deck!
hint3: They resemble Skeletons donning team-colored bandannas.

hint1: Don't tell him that his finger guns aren't real!
hint2: This shocking version of the Giant has a Zap Pack, which zaps back anything nearby that attacks him.
hint3: He generally resembles the Giant, but is bare-chested, has spiky eyebrows and beard.

hint1: This big blue dude digs the simple things in life - Dark Elixir drinks and throwing rocks.
hint2: This huge menacing but also relaxed ogre with high hitpoints throws boulders.
hint3: An indigo-skinned humanoid creature with blue eyes.

hint1: It's a miracle he doesn't lose an arm.
hint2: For 5 Elixir, he provides insane value with moderately high hitpoints and a sharp piercing axe that damages everything.
hint3: A shirtless man who has blue eyes, a large red nose, and a five-o'clock shadow.

hint1: Bet they won't see that coming!
hint2: It's slick and quick too, being able to sneakily lock onto a Princess Tower in the blink of an eye.
hint3: A Cannon with a wooden base atop a wooden cart.

hint1: It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!
hint2: 3 Goblins for 3 Elixir that fly in a barrel.
hint3: A wooden barrel with a Goblin logo on it.

hint1: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings.
hint2: It's great when taking out support units in a huge push.
hint3: A deep blue liquid encased in a large vial.

hint1: Everybody chill.
hint2: This 4 Elixir spell incapacitates and slightly damages troops and buildings for 4 seconds.
hint3: A cyan liquid bottled inside a transparent jar.

hint1: It rolls over and damages anything in its path.
hint2: An angry Barbarian in a barrel rolls a moderate distance.
hint3: A spiked barrel with a Barbarian inside it.

hint1: Covers the area in a deadly toxin.
hint2: A 4 Elixir area-denial spell that maintains a powerful presence.
hint3: A deep red liquid in a thin oblong vial.

hint1: And thrice were their afflictions... nixed, vexed, and hexed!
hint2: For 2 Elixir, this spell deals very low damage in its duration.
hint3: A lime colored liquid encased in a large vial, which is secured by a thin rope, with a large, rectangular wooden cap that has three golden hair and two green eyes on the front.

hint1: Increases troop movement and attack speed.
hint2: Pump up your troops with a 2 Elixir boost!
hint3: A deep purple potion packed in a large bottle.

hint1: Troops are fragile, but pack the same punch as the original!
hint2: For only 3 Elixir, it doubles the damage and can overwhelm opponents.
hint3: A translucent, teal colored liquid encased in a small oblong vial.

hint1: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet.
hint2: This windy spell pulls any troops in its large effective radius.
hint3: A very large radius and low damage that is dealt every second for 1.05 seconds.

hint1: Does not appear in your starting hand.
hint2: It can be used to double up attacks for a high reward.
hint3: It does not have a defined Elixir cost.

hint1: You shall not pass! Unless there are lot of you...
hint2: For 3 Elixir, this black magic spell encroaches a black hole in the arena.
hint3: A deep orange-amber liquid in a large vial.

hint1: Nice tower you got there. Would be a shame if this whittled it down from this side of the Arena...
hint2: It can quickly whittle down small swarms and moderate-health troops.
hint3: A crossbow with wooden, stone, and metallic features along with a shining steel bolt for ammunition mounted on top of a base with a metal rim.

hint1: Building capable of burrowing underground and appearing anywhere in the Arena.
hint2: These Goblins have abandoned locomotion with wooden barrels; now they've got a whole machine!
hint3: A wooden hull, a circular hatch, a team-colored stripe, and a metal drill on its top.

hint1: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next.
hint2: This super soldier will land with a BOOM.
hint3: A man with blue eyes, wears a helmet with a team-colored feather on top, maces, and huge armor.

hint1: Together they charge through the Arena; snaring enemies, knocking down towers... and chewing grass?!
hint2: It snares and damages any nearby troops, slowing their travelling speed significantly.
hint3: A dark-skinned woman who has light brown eyes and white spots on her face, wears a sandal dress.

hint1: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands!
hint2: For just 4 Elixir, he lands with a free zap and continues to zap two opponents at once.
hint3: A man with blue eyes, long ears, black spiky hair, eyebrows and moustache.

hint1: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.
hint2: For 4 Elixir, this dragon has moderately high health and high damage.
hint3: A Dragon with a helmet, a yellow hose and a fuel tank on its back.

hint1: Overkill isn't in her vocabulary.
hint2: A powerful machine with moderately high hitpoints that nukes a small area on the ground every 4 seconds.
hint3: A front-facing golden tesla coil with an attached steel ram.

hint1: It's not magic, it's a shovel.
hint2: This underground mini-tank is always a surprise to the opponent!
hint3: A man wearing a dark gray helmet with a partially melted candle on top.

hint1: If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.
hint2: For 3 Elixir, she sets anything on fire with her moderate hitpoints, area damage, and very long range!
hint3: A woman with brown eyes, dark brown hair and eyebrows, wearing a crown.

hint1: This mystical creature will be reborn as an egg when destroyed.
hint2: He packs moderately low health, with decent damage, and to compensate, he will lay an Egg when he dies.
hint3: It is a light red bird with teal eyes, yellow sclerae, a maroon beak.

hint1: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy.
hint2: A vengeful spirit is haunting the Arena!
hint3: An undead King who wears a crown, dark gauntlets and chain mail.

hint1: He has a handlebar mustache that's too hot for TV.
hint2: For 3 Elixir, it may not seem like much, but he can stop enemies in their tracks.
hint3: A man with cyan spiky hair, fuzzy eyebrows, glowing eyes.

hint1: Not quite a Wizard, nor an Archer.
hint2: He can safely pierce buildings from afar, as well as multiple targets within the arrow's linear path.
hint3: A man with white hair, glowing turquoise eyes, bushy black eyebrows.

hint1: The mask keeps her identity safe.
hint2: When she dashes, nothing can touch her.
hint3: She has green eyes and white hair, wears a mask, and a dark olive cloak.

hint1: A majestic flying beast that attacks buildings.
hint2: This tank is slow and expensive at 7 Elixir, and must be well-supported.
hint3: A flying, burning rock beast with an underbite.

hint1: Summons Bats to do her bidding!
hint2: She can quickly swarm units and towers with her Bats.
hint3: She has glowing blue eyes and wears a black cloak.

hint1: He chops trees by day and hunts The Log by night.
hint2: He shreds tanks, towers, and even small swarms with his extremely fast attack speed and high damage.
hint3: He wields an axe and carries a Rage Spell on his shoulder.

hint1: Rider of Dragons.
hint2: Comes into the arena depending on your need.
hint3: A scimitar with a light blue glow and a blue handle.

hint1: Who let a baby drive this thing?
hint2: For 5 Elixir, a massive mech made of wood and metal is deployed into the arena.
hint3: A wood and metal mech with green zig zag lines, and spikes on the edges.

hint1: She also bakes great cookies.
hint2: For 4 Elixir, this witch cackles wildly as she curses her foes.
hint3: A woman with glowing blue eyes and wears a purple cloak with a pink lining.

hint1: He's also mastered the ancient art of 'Fish Slapping'.
hint2: He pulls troops towards him with his hook so he can slow them and kill them with a slap.
hint3: A man with a large nose, blonde eyebrows and beard.

hint1: Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!
hint2: It rolls. It crushes. It knocks back.
hint3: It appears as a long, spiked piece of wood.

hint1: Surprise! It's a party. A Skeleton party, anywhere in the Arena. Yay!
hint2: This portable 5 Elixir ritual starts a Skeleton party anywhere in the Arena!
hint3: After 2.2 seconds, it spawns a single Skeleton.

hint1: A warrior with luxurious hair and outstanding flexibility.
hint2: For 1 Elixir, you can use his dashingly Dashing Dash, instantly dashing through a foe through another for up to 10 times
hint3: a man who has blue eyes, golden hair and eyebrows

hint1: The King of the undead himself.
hint2: For 2 Elixir, you can use his Soul Summoning. It will release all of the souls he kept for battle in form of Skeletons around a royal Graveyard aura around him
hint3: a massive Skeleton wearing a menacingly large dark chestplate and gauntlets

hint1: The boss of the Forest Gang finally shows her face...kind of.
hint2: For 1 Elixir, you can use her Getaway Grenade, she turns invisible while teleporting back 6 tiles
hint3: a woman with teal eyes, has light red hair and eyebrows

hint1: She is fast, deadly and hard to catch.
hint2: For 1 Elixir, you can use her Cloaking Cape ability, mitigating the glass part of her by turning herself invisible
hint3: She appears as an Archer, except she wears a crown

hint1: This makes him not only the mightiest, but also the sneakiest Miner in the Arena.
hint2: For 1 Elixir, you can use his Explosive Escape, which makes him drill underground and cross over to his other side
hint3: a hunk with tangerine-colored hair, eyebrows and a mustache

hint1: It’s ALIVE! Monster lumbers towards enemy buildings while Doctor waits to spring the trap
hint2: For 2 Elixir you can use his Lightning Link, which is quite shocking for him and the Monster!
hint3: The Monster is a large, green Goblin with a square head

hint1: Who let their nephew into the Arena?!
hint2: For 3 Elixir, you can use his Royal Rescue to meet his guardian: Guardienne.
hint3: She has cyan eyes, blonde eyebrows, and a scar on her left eye, wields a greatsword, is dressed in a gray-colored armor.

hint1: Has spent many isolated years perfecting a new style of combat.
hint2: For 1 Elixir, you can use his Pensive Protection, an ability that makes him meditate for a while and chill out.
hint3: Similar to the Hog Rider, except that he is tan, and his mohawk, beard and eyebrows are white.
